H0.text: What phrase describes the runner, driver or rider in the lead of a race. Front-runner

H1.text: What phrase describes the runner, driver or rider in the lead of a race. Leader of the pack

H2.text: What phrase describes the runner, driver or rider in the lead of a race. Trailblazer

H3.text: What phrase describes the runner, driver or rider in the lead of a race. Pace-setter

A4.text: Front-runner is a term to describe the leader in a race, whether in politics, sports or a beauty pageant.
